Public NotInheritable Class SqlBulkCopy Implements IDisposable
public ref class SqlBulkCopy sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 可讓您有效率地大量載入具有另一個來源的資料之 SQL Server 資料表。

span.span: Lets you efficiently bulk load a SQL Server table with data from another source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft SQL Server 包含名為常用的命令提示字元公用程式**bcp**如之間移動資料從一個資料表，在單一伺服器或伺服器之間。Microsoft SQL Server includes a popular command-prompt utility named **bcp** for moving data from one table to another, whether on a single server or between servers. 類別可讓您撰寫 managed 程式碼解決方案，以提供類似的功能。The class lets you write managed code solutions that provide similar functionality. 還有其他方式將資料載入 SQL Server 資料表 （INSERT 陳述式，例如），但提供顯著的效能優勢。There are other ways to load data into a SQL Server table (INSERT statements, for example), but offers a significant performance advantage over them. 類別可用於僅將資料寫入 SQL Server 資料表。The class can be used to write data only to SQL Server tables. 不過，資料來源不限於 SQL Server;任何資料來源可以使用，因為可以將資料載入至執行個體，或是讀取執行個體。However, the data source is not limited to SQL Server; any data source can be used, as long as the data can be loaded to a instance or read with a instance. 將會失敗時大量載入類型的資料行在 SQL Server 型別是日期/時間類型的其中一個資料行加入 SQL Server 2008 中。 will fail when bulk loading a column of type into a SQL Server column whose type is one of the date/time types added in SQL Server 2008. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式示範如何使用 類別來載入資料。The following console application demonstrates how to load data using the class. 在此範例中，用來將資料從複製**Production.Product**資料表中[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] **AdventureWorks**相同資料庫中的類似資料表的資料庫。In this example, a is used to copy data from the **Production.Product** table in the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]**AdventureWorks** database to a similar table in the same database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為連線已經開啟時初始化執行個體，連接會保持開啟之後執行個體已關閉。Because the connection is already open when the instance is initialized, the connection remains open after the instance is closed. 如果`connection`引數為 null，就會擲回。If the `connection` argument is null, an is thrown. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式示範如何將資料大量載入使用已開啟的連接。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data using a connection that is already open. 在此範例中，用來將資料從複製**Production.Product**資料表中[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] **AdventureWorks**相同資料庫中的類似資料表的資料庫。In this example, a is used to copy data from the **Production.Product** table in the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]**AdventureWorks** database to a similar table in the same database. 此範例僅供示範之用。This example is for demonstration purposes only. 您不會將`SqlBulkCopy`將資料從一個資料表移動到另一個相同資料庫中的實際執行應用程式。You would not use `SqlBulkCopy` to move data from one table to another in the same database in a production application. 請注意，來源資料不需要位於 SQL Server;您可以使用任何可讀取的資料來源或載入。Note that the source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以取得詳細的資訊中的所有大量複製選項主題。You can obtain detailed information about all the bulk copy options in the topic. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式示範如何使用指定為字串的連接來執行大量載入。The following console application demonstrates how to perform a bulk load by using a connection specified as a string. 選項設定為使用來源資料表的 identity 資料行中的值，當您載入目的地資料表。An option is set to use the value in the identity column of the source table when you load the destination table. 在此範例中，來源資料第一次讀取 SQL Server 資料表，以從執行個體。In this example, the source data is first read from a SQL Server table to a instance. 來源資料表及目標資料表都包含識別資料行。The source table and destination table each include an Identity column. 根據預設，新值**識別**會產生每個資料列加入目的地資料表中的資料行。By default, a new value for the **Identity** column is generated in the destination table for each row added. 在此範例中，選項會設定開啟連接時，會強制大量載入處理序使用**識別**改為來源資料表中的值。In this example, an option is set when the connection is opened that forces the bulk load process to use the **Identity** values from the source table instead. 若要查看如何選項變更運作的方式大量負載，以執行此範例**dbo。BulkCopyDemoMatchingColumns**空的資料表。To see how the option changes the way the bulk load works, run the sample with the **dbo.BulkCopyDemoMatchingColumns** table empty. 從來源載入的所有資料列。All rows load from the source. 然後範例再次執行無需空白資料表。Then run the sample again without emptying the table. 擲回例外狀況，程式碼會將訊息寫入主控台，告知您未能加入資料列，因為主索引鍵條件約束違規。An exception is thrown and the code writes a message to the console notifying you that rows weren't added because of primary key constraint violations. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果選項包括`UseInternalTransaction`和`externalTransaction`引數不是 null， **InvalidArgumentException**就會擲回。If options include `UseInternalTransaction` and the `externalTransaction` argument is not null, an **InvalidArgumentException** is thrown. 如需範例示範如何使用`SqlBulkCopy`在交易中，請參閱[異動和大量複製作業](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/transaction-and-bulk-copy-operations.md)。For examples demonstrating how to use `SqlBulkCopy` in a transaction, see [Transaction and Bulk Copy Operations](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/transaction-and-bulk-copy-operations.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BatchSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 每個批次中的資料列數目。

span.span: Number of rows in each batch.

summary.span: 每個批次結束時，批次中的資料列會傳送到伺服器。

span.span: At the end of each batch, the rows in the batch are sent to the server.

value.span: 屬性的整數值；如果未設定任何值，則為零。

span.span: The integer value of the property, or zero if no value has been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批次時，即完成資料列都已處理或傳送到目的地資料來源沒有多個資料列。A batch is complete when rows have been processed or there are no more rows to send to the destination data source. 零 （預設值） 表示，每個作業是在單一批次。Zero (the default) indicates that each operation is a single batch. 如果執行個體已宣告但選項作用中，資料列會傳送到伺服器會從資料列在一段期間，但沒有交易相關的動作。If the instance has been declared without the option in effect, rows are sent to the server rows at a time, but no transaction-related action is taken. 如果作用中，是以個別的交易插入的資料列的每個批次。If is in effect, each batch of rows is inserted as a separate transaction. 屬性可以在任何時間設定。The property can be set at any time. 如果大量複製已在進行中，目前的批次的大小調整為根據上一個批次大小。If a bulk copy is already in progress, the current batch is sized according to the previous batch size. 後續的批次使用新的大小。Subsequent batches use the new size. 如果一開始是零和已變更時作業正在進行中，作業會當做單一批次的資料載入。If the is initially zero and changed while a operation is already in progress, that operation loads the data as a single batch. 任何後續上相同的作業使用新的執行個體。Any subsequent operations on the same instance use the new . ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式示範如何將資料大量載入的 50 個資料列批次。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data in batches of 50 rows. 如範例說明如何適用於交易，請參閱[異動和大量複製作業](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/transaction-and-bulk-copy-operations.md)。For an example illustrating how works with a transaction, see [Transaction and Bulk Copy Operations](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/transaction-and-bulk-copy-operations.md). 在此範例中，來源資料第一次讀取 SQL Server 資料表，以從執行個體。In this example, the source data is first read from a SQL Server table to a instance. 來源資料不需要位於 SQL Server;您可以使用任何可讀取的資料來源或載入。The source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.BatchSize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.BatchSize/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.BatchSize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.BatchSize/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BulkCopyTimeout { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 完成作業的秒數，在這之後作業會逾時。

span.span: Number of seconds for the operation to complete before it times out.
The integer value of the property.
The default is 30 seconds.

value.span: 值為 0 表示沒有限制；大量複製會無限期等候。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates no limit; the bulk copy will wait indefinitely.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果作業逾時時間，也不會認可交易，並複製的所有資料列會移除從目的地資料表。If the operation does time out, the transaction is not committed and all copied rows are removed from the destination table. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式示範如何修改逾時為 60 秒大量載入資料時。The following console application demonstrates how to modify the time-out to 60 seconds when bulk loading data. 在此範例中，來源資料第一次讀取[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]資料表執行個體。In this example, the source data is first read from a [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] table to a instance. 來源資料不需要位於[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]; 您可以使用任何可讀取的資料來源或載入。The source data does not have to be located on [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]執行個體，它會更方便且快速地使用[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] instance, it is easier and faster to use a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]`INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.Timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.Timeout/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.Timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.Timeout/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Closes the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在您呼叫後上物件沒有其他作業將會成功。After you call a on the object, no other operation will succeed. 呼叫方法會擲回。Calls to the method will throw an . 呼叫方法從事件導致擲回。Calling the method from the event causes an to be thrown. 請注意開啟執行個體視為封閉式隱含結尾`using`區塊。Note that open instances are closed implicitly at the end of a `using` block. ## Examples 下列範例會使用相同將銷售訂單和其關聯的詳細資料加入至兩個目的地資料表的執行個體。The following example uses the same instance to add sales orders and their associated details to two destination tables. 因為**AdventureWorks**銷售訂單資料表很大，範例會讀取只有某些帳戶號碼所下的訂單和大量複製到目的地資料表的那些訂單和明細。Because the **AdventureWorks** sales order tables are large, the sample reads only orders placed by a certain account number and bulk copies those orders and details to the destination tables. 只有這兩個大量複製作業完成之後，會使用方法。The method is used only after both bulk copy operations are complete. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. summary.span: 傳回 項目的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of items.

summary.span: 資料行對應會定義資料來源中資料行和目的地中資料行之間的關聯性。

span.span: Column mappings define the relationships between columns in the data source and columns in the destination.
A collection of column mappings.

value.span: 根據預設，它可以是空的集合。

span.span: By default, it is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料來源和目的地資料表有相同數目的資料行，而且資料來源中的每個來源資料行的序數位置中符合相對應的目的地資料行的序數位置是不必要的集合。If the data source and the destination table have the same number of columns, and the ordinal position of each source column within the data source matches the ordinal position of the corresponding destination column, the collection is unnecessary. 不過，如果資料行計數不同，或不一致的序數位置，您必須使用以確定資料會複製到正確的資料行。However, if the column counts differ, or the ordinal positions are not consistent, you must use to make sure that data is copied into the correct columns. 在執行大量複製作業時，此集合可供存取，但無法變更。During the execution of a bulk copy operation, this collection can be accessed, but it cannot be changed. 若要變更它的任何嘗試將會擲回。Any attempt to change it will throw an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未設定時呼叫時，就會擲回。If has not been set when is called, an is thrown. 如果遭到修改時作業正在執行，變更不會影響目前的作業。If is modified while a operation is running, the change does not affect the current operation. 新使用下一次的值方法呼叫。The new value is used the next time a method is called. 這是三部分名稱 (`..`)。 is a three-part name (`..`). 如果您選擇，您可以限定資料表名稱的資料庫和主控結構描述。You can qualify the table name with its database and owning schema if you choose. 不過，如果資料表名稱使用底線 ("_") 或任何其他特殊字元，您必須逸出名稱使用周圍的方括號中 (`[..]`)。However, if the table name uses an underscore ("_") or any other special characters, you must escape the name using surrounding brackets as in (`[..]`). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中的 < 識別碼 >。For more information, see "Identifiers" in SQL Server Books Online. 您可以將資料大量複製到暫存資料表使用的值，例如`tempdb..#table`或`tempdb..#table`如屬性。You can bulk-copy data to a temporary table by using a value such as `tempdb..#table` or `tempdb..#table` for the property. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式示範如何將資料大量載入使用已開啟的連接。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data using a connection that is already open. 目的地資料表是中的資料表**AdventureWorks**資料庫。The destination table is a table in the **AdventureWorks** database. 在此範例中，連接第一次使用的 SQL Server 資料表中讀取資料執行個體。In this example, the connection is first used to read data from a SQL Server table to a instance. 來源資料不需要位於 SQL Server;您可以使用任何可讀取的資料來源或載入。The source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是`true`，讀取物件使用，記憶體使用量最佳化使用串流處理功能。When is `true`, reads from an object using , optimizing memory usage by using the streaming capabilities. 當設定為 false，類別會載入所傳回的資料物件傳送至之前的記憶體[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]或 SQL Azure。When it’s set to false, the class loads all the data returned by the object into memory before sending it to [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] or SQL Azure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性被設計用於使用者介面元件，以說明大量複製作業的進度。This property is designed for user interface components that illustrate the progress of a bulk copy operation. 表示產生通知事件之前要處理的資料列數目。It indicates the number of rows to be processed before generating a notification event. 即使在大量複製作業正在進行中時，可以在任何時間，設定屬性。The property can be set at any time, even while a bulk copy operation is underway. 大量複製作業期間所做的變更在下一個通知之後才會生效。Changes made during a bulk copy operation take effect after the next notification. 新的設定套用到相同的執行個體上的所有後續作業。The new setting applies to all subsequent operations on the same instance. 如果是設定為數目小於零，則就會擲回。If is set to a number less than zero, an is thrown. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式示範如何將資料大量載入使用已開啟的連接。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data using a connection that is already open. 屬性設定，讓每個 50 個資料列複製到資料表之後，事件處理常式的呼叫。The property is set so that the event handler is called after every 50 rows copied to the table. 在此範例中，連接第一次使用的 SQL Server 資料表中讀取資料執行個體。In this example, the connection is first used to read data from a SQL Server table to a instance. 然後第二個連接被開啟的資料大量複製。Then a second connection is opened to bulk copy the data. 請注意，來源資料不需要位於 SQL Server;您可以使用任何可讀取的資料來源或載入。Note that the source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，設定和無關。Note that the settings of and are independent. 收到事件並不代表任何資料列已傳送到伺服器或認可。Receipt of a event does not imply that any rows have been sent to the server or committed. 您不能呼叫 SqlBulkCopy.Close () 或 SqlConnection.Close () 從這個事件。You cannot call SqlBulkCopy.Close () or SqlConnection.Close () from this event. 如此一來，這會導致擲回，而不會變更物件狀態。Doing this will cause an being thrown, and the object state will not change. 如果使用者想要取消事件，從作業屬性可用。If the user wants to cancel the operation from the event, the property of the can be used. (請參閱[異動和大量複製作業](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/transaction-and-bulk-copy-operations.md)如需範例，使用屬性。)(See [Transaction and Bulk Copy Operations](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/transaction-and-bulk-copy-operations.md) for examples that use the property.) 任何動作，例如交易活動，支援大量複製作業，在執行期間的連線，而且建議您不要使用相同的連接期間使用事件。No action, such as transaction activity, is supported in the connection during the execution of the bulk copy operation, and it is recommended that you not use the same connection used during the event. 不過，您可以開啟不同的連接。However, you can open a different connection. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式示範如何將資料大量載入使用已開啟的連接。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data using a connection that is already open. 屬性設定，讓每個 50 個資料列複製到資料表之後，事件處理常式的呼叫。The property is set so that the event handler is called after every 50 rows copied to the table. 在此範例中，連接第一次使用的 SQL Server 資料表中讀取資料執行個體。In this example, the connection is first used to read data from a SQL Server table to a instance. 請注意，來源資料不需要位於 SQL Server;您可以使用任何可讀取的資料來源或載入。Note that the source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 將 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的所有資料列會複製到目的地資料表，除了已刪除。All rows in the are copied to the destination table except those that have been deleted. 大量複製作業正在進行時，相關聯的目的地忙碌處理，而且可以在連接上執行任何其他的作業。While the bulk copy operation is in progress, the associated destination is busy serving it, and no other operations can be performed on the connection. 集合對應從目的地資料庫的資料表資料行。The collection maps from the columns to the destination database table. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式示範如何在大量載入資料，從。The following Console application demonstrates how to bulk load data from a . 目的地資料表是中的資料表**AdventureWorks**資料庫。The destination table is a table in the **AdventureWorks** database. 在此範例中，建立在執行階段和來源的`SqlBulkCopy`作業。In this example, a is created at run time and is the source of the `SqlBulkCopy` operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. summary.span: 將已提供之 中的所有資料列複製到 物件之 屬性所指定的目的資料表。

span.span: Copies all rows in the supplied to a destination table specified by the property of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下一個可用的資料列，讀取器中開始複製作業。The copy operation starts at the next available row in the reader. 大部分的情況下，讀取器只傳回或類似的呼叫，因此下一個可用的資料列是第一個資料列。Most of the time, the reader was just returned by or a similar call, so the next available row is the first row. 若要處理多個結果，請呼叫上的資料讀取器和呼叫一次。To process multiple results, call on the data reader and call again. 請注意，使用修改讀取器的狀態。Note that using modifies the state of the reader. 方法會呼叫直到它傳回 false，作業已中止時，或發生錯誤。The method will call until it returns false, the operation is aborted, or an error occurs. 這表示資料讀取器會在不同的狀態，可能會在結果集中，結尾時作業已完成。This means that the data reader will be in a different state, probably at the end of the result set, when the operation is complete. 大量複製作業正在進行時，相關聯的目的地忙碌處理，而且可以在連接上執行任何其他的作業。While the bulk copy operation is in progress, the associated destination is busy serving it, and no other operations can be performed on the connection. 集合的資料讀取器資料行對應到目的地資料庫資料表。The collection maps from the data reader columns to the destination database table. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式示範如何在大量載入資料，從。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data from a . 目的地資料表是中的資料表**AdventureWorks**資料庫。The destination table is a table in the **AdventureWorks** database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. span.span: Copies only rows that match the supplied row state in the supplied to a destination table specified by the property of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有當資料列中中所示的狀態`rowState`引數而且不刪除複製到目的地資料表。Only rows in the that are in the states indicated in the `rowState` argument and have not been deleted are copied to the destination table. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定，則任何， ，和資料列也會複製到伺服器。If is specified, any , , and rows will also be copied to the server. 將會不引發任何例外狀況。No exception will be raised. 大量複製作業正在進行時，相關聯的目的地忙碌處理，而且可以在連接上執行任何其他的作業。While the bulk copy operation is in progress, the associated destination is busy serving it, and no other operations can be performed on the connection. 集合對應從目的地資料庫的資料表資料行。The collection maps from the columns to the destination database table. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式示範如何在大量載入中的列之符合指定的狀態。The following Console application demonstrates how to bulk load only the rows in a that match a specified state. 在此情況下，只有未變更的資料列會加入。In this case, only unchanged rows are added. 目的地資料表是中的資料表**AdventureWorks**資料庫。The destination table is a table in the **AdventureWorks** database. 在此範例中，建立在執行的階段和三個資料列會加入。In this example, a is created at run time and three rows are added to it. 之前執行方法，其中一個資料列編輯。Before the method is executed, one of the rows is edited. 方法呼叫`DataRowState.Unchanged``rowState`引數，因此只有兩個變更的資料列會使用大量複製到目的地。The method is called with a `DataRowState.Unchanged` `rowState` argument, so only the two unchanged rows are bulk copied to the destination. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.DataRowState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.DataRowState/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.DataRowState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.DataRowState/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 的非同步版本，該版本會將資料來源中的所有資料列複製到 物件的 屬性所指定的目的資料表。

span.span: An asynchronous version of , which copies all rows from a data source to a destination table specified by the property of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 multiple active result set (MARS) 停用，忙碌中 」 建立的連接。If multiple active result sets (MARS) is disabled, makes the connection busy. 如果啟用 MARS 時，您可以交錯使用呼叫與相同的連接中的其他命令。If MARS is enabled, you can interleave calls to with other commands in the same connection. 其中一個失敗時，會回復的資料列數目取決於幾項工作：The number of rows that are rolled back when one fails depends on several things: - 如果指定。If is specified. - 如果您有自己的交易。If you have your own transaction. - 的值。The value of . 同時將資料傳送至伺服器，也就是目前的批次發生錯誤時 (所指定) 將會回復。When there is an error while sending data to the server, the current batch (as specified by ) will be rolled back. 如果未指定，並且已經您自己的交易，整個交易將會回復 （其中包含以及所有先前批次）。If is not specified and you have your own transaction, the entire transaction will be rolled back (which includes all previous batches as well). 使用知道多少資料列被複製到伺服器。Use to know how many rows were copied to the server.
